name: The Rooms 2 [COMING SOON]
description:
Every playthrough is different. Survive as long as you can. How much rooms can you pass? 

The game is not out yet. The game will be free, though. Get ready! Join my discord if you'd like to get info about this game! Release date: 4/21/2019

IF YOU PAY, YOU ARE PAYING FOR THE EXTRA CONTENT VERSION. YOU DO NOT NEED TO PAY.

NOTE: YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD PYTHON FIRST TO BE ABLE TO PLAY THIS GAME: https://www.python.org/downloads/ (python is automatically installed for mac and linux. If still does not work, download python 3 using the link.) 

Discord (To see more of my projects): https://discord.gg/db2xN9m
